languages.text: "Благодарю, Ваша Светлость. Я всего лишь исполняю долг дисциплинарного офицера Империума. Спасайтесь!" {n}Хитро подмигнув вам в последний раз на прощание, Комиссар оборачивается обратно к солдатам и кричит:{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ArenaFaithEnding}За Императора-а-а{/d}!"

traits.locale_text: "Благодарю, Ваша Светлость. Я всего лишь исполняю долг дисциплинарного офицера Империума. Спасайтесь!" {n}Хитро подмигнув вам в последний раз на прощание, Комиссар оборачивается обратно к солдатам и кричит:{/n} "За Императора-а-а!"

languages.text: "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Just doing my duty as a disciplinary officer of the Imperium. Save yourself!" {n}With a parting wink, the Commissar turns back to his troops and bellows,{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ArenaFaithEnding}For the Emperor{/d}!"
languages.original_text: "Благодарю, Ваша Светлость. Я всего лишь исполняю долг дисциплинарного офицера Империума. Спасайтесь!" {n}Хитро подмигнув вам в последний раз на прощание, Комиссар оборачивается обратно к солдатам и кричит:{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ArenaFaithEnding}За Императора-а-а{/d}!"

traits.locale_text: "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Just doing my duty as a disciplinary officer of the Imperium. Save yourself!" {n}With a parting wink, the Commissar turns back to his troops and bellows,{/n} "For the Emperor!"

"Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Just doing my duty as a disciplinary officer of the Imperium. Save yourself!" {n}With a parting wink, the Commissar turns back to his troops and bellows,{/n} "For the Emperor!"

"Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Just doing my duty as a disciplinary officer of the Imperium. Save yourself!" {n}With a parting wink, the Commissar turns back to his troops and bellows,{/n} "For the Emperor!"

"Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Just doing my duty as a disciplinary officer of the Imperium. Save yourself!" {n}With a parting wink, the Commissar turns back to his troops and bellows,{/n} "For the Emperor!"

"Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Just doing my duty as a disciplinary officer of the Imperium. Save yourself!" {n}With a parting wink, the Commissar turns back to his troops and bellows,{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ArenaFaithEnding}For the Emperor{/d}!"

languages.text: “谢谢你，大人。我只是在履行我身为帝国政委的职责罢了，努力活下来吧！”{n}政委朝你眨了眨眼，与你道别。随后，他转身走向他的士兵，高喊道。{/n}“{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ArenaFaithEnding}为了帝皇{/d}！”
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Just doing my duty as a disciplinary officer of the Imperium. Save yourself!" {n}With a parting wink, the Commissar turns back to his troops and bellows,{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ArenaFaithEnding}For the Emperor{/d}!"

traits.locale_text: “谢谢你，大人。我只是在履行我身为帝国政委的职责罢了，努力活下来吧！”{n}政委朝你眨了眨眼，与你道别。随后，他转身走向他的士兵，高喊道。{/n}“为了帝皇！”

languages.text: 「ありがとうございます、陛下。私は帝国の軍士官としての義務を果たしているだけです。お逃げください！」{n}お別れのウィンクをすると、コミッサーは部隊の方へ振り返り、猛々しく叫んだ。{/n}「{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ArenaFaithEnding}皇帝のために{/d}！」
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Just doing my duty as a disciplinary officer of the Imperium. Save yourself!" {n}With a parting wink, the Commissar turns back to his troops and bellows,{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ArenaFaithEnding}For the Emperor{/d}!"

traits.locale_text: 「ありがとうございます、陛下。私は帝国の軍士官としての義務を果たしているだけです。お逃げください！」{n}お別れのウィンクをすると、コミッサーは部隊の方へ振り返り、猛々しく叫んだ。{/n}「{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ArenaFaithEnding}皇帝のために{/d}！」

languages.text: «Gracias, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Solo cumplo mi deber como oficial disciplinario del Imperium. ¡Usted sálvese!». {n}Con un guiño de despedida, el Comisario se gira hacia sus tropas y brama:{/n} «¡{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ArenaFaithEnding}Por el Emperador{/d}!».
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Just doing my duty as a disciplinary officer of the Imperium. Save yourself!" {n}With a parting wink, the Commissar turns back to his troops and bellows,{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ArenaFaithEnding}For the Emperor{/d}!"

traits.locale_text: «Gracias, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Solo cumplo mi deber como oficial disciplinario del Imperium. ¡Usted sálvese!». {n}Con un guiño de despedida, el Comisario se gira hacia sus tropas y brama:{/n} «¡Por el Emperador!».

languages.original_text: "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Just doing my duty as a disciplinary officer of the Imperium. Save yourself!" {n}With a parting wink, the Commissar turns back to his troops and bellows,{/n} "For the Emperor!"

languages.text: « Merci, Votre Seigneurie. Je ne fais que mon devoir d'officier de l'Imperium. Allez, sauvez-vous ! » {n}Après vous avoir adressé un dernier clin d'œil, le commissaire se retourne vers ses troupes et hurle :{/n} « {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ArenaFaithEnding}Pour l'Empereur{/d} ! »
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Just doing my duty as a disciplinary officer of the Imperium. Save yourself!" {n}With a parting wink, the Commissar turns back to his troops and bellows,{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ArenaFaithEnding}For the Emperor{/d}!"

traits.locale_text: « Merci, Votre Seigneurie. Je ne fais que mon devoir d'officier de l'Imperium. Allez, sauvez-vous ! » {n}Après vous avoir adressé un dernier clin d'œil, le commissaire se retourne vers ses troupes et hurle :{/n} « Pour l'Empereur ! »

languages.text: "Danke, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich erfülle nur meine Pflicht als Disziplinaroffizier des Imperiums. Rettet Euch selbst!" {n}Der Kommissar winkt zum Abschied, wendet sich wieder seinen Truppen zu und bellt:{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ArenaFaithEnding}Für den Imperator{/d}!"
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Just doing my duty as a disciplinary officer of the Imperium. Save yourself!" {n}With a parting wink, the Commissar turns back to his troops and bellows,{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ArenaFaithEnding}For the Emperor{/d}!"

traits.locale_text: "Danke, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich erfülle nur meine Pflicht als Disziplinaroffizier des Imperiums. Rettet Euch selbst!" {n}Der Kommissar winkt zum Abschied, wendet sich wieder seinen Truppen zu und bellt:{/n} "Für den Imperator!"

languages.text: "Çok yaşayın {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. İmparatorluk disiplin subayı olarak vazifemi yerine getiriyorum. Kurtarın kendinizi!" {n}Veda edercesine göz kırpan Komiser, birliklerine dönüp haykırıyor.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ArenaFaithEnding}İmparator için{/d}!"
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Just doing my duty as a disciplinary officer of the Imperium. Save yourself!" {n}With a parting wink, the Commissar turns back to his troops and bellows,{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ArenaFaithEnding}For the Emperor{/d}!"

traits.locale_text: "Çok yaşayın {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. İmparatorluk subaylarından biri olarak görevimi yapıyorum. Kurtarın kendinizi!" {n}Veda edercesine göz kırpan Komiser, birliklerine dönüp haykırıyor.{/n} "İmparator için!"
